featured.text: Also, you may have to share common facilities (such as bathrooms) with other guests.
Many other five-year-olds had problems reaching the bathroom sink.
However, the plastic step-stool she had at home was unstable and cluttered up the small bathroom shared by her whole family.

definition.en_def: A room containing a toilet and sink, and typically a bathtub or shower.
definition.example: I need to use the bathroom before we leave.
